General.Name: Qingdao Topscomm Commun Inc
General.Description: Qingdao Topscomm Communication INC. engages in the research and development, production, sale, and service of products in the field of medium-voltage and low-voltage power distribution in the power industry. It offers power line carrier communication chips, communication modules, smart energy meters, power distribution terminals, power quality and reliability equipment, etc., as well as LV-PLC communication, smart energy meters, communication terminals, MV-PLC communication, and distribution automation systems. Its products are used in the electricity consumption information acquisition system and distribution of the smart grid internet of things electric automation system. Qingdao Topscomm Communication INC. was founded in 2008 and is headquartered in Qingdao, China.
